ai-snp5.7:1.1_0: “I am the great hermit, Sakka, the Lord of the World,
ai-snp5.7:1.3_0: I am not able to cross over the great flood.
ai-snp5.7:1.4_0: Please tell me of a support, All-Seeing Visionary,
ai-snp5.7:1.5_0: what can I cross over the flood.”
ai-snp5.7:2.3_0: depending on nothing, cross over the flood.
ai-snp5.7:2.4_0: Having given up sense pleasures, abstaining from talk,
ai-snp5.7:2.5_0: day and night you must look for the end of suffering.”
ai-snp5.7:3.1_0: “He who is passionless in regard to all sense pleasures,
ai-snp5.7:3.3_0: who is depending on nothingness, having given up sense pleasures,
ai-snp5.7:3.4_0: Having attained the highest freedom, freed in the highest attainment.
ai-snp5.7:3.5_0: will he remain there without going away?”
ai-snp5.7:4.1_0: “He who is passionless in regard to all sense pleasures,
ai-snp5.7:4.3_0: who is depending on nothingness, having given up sense pleasures,
ai-snp5.7:4.4_0: Having attained the highest freedom, freed in the highest attainment.
ai-snp5.7:4.5_0: he will remain there without going away.”
ai-snp5.7:5.1_0: “If he remains there without going away
ai-snp5.7:5.2_0: for a great number of years, All-Seeing Visionary,
ai-snp5.7:5.4_0: or will the consciousness of such a one fall away?”
ai-snp5.7:6.1_0: “As a flame swept away the wind,
ai-snp5.7:6.3_0: goes to rest and can no longer be discerned,
ai-snp5.7:6.4_0: just so the Sage free from the mental body
ai-snp5.7:6.5_0: goes to rest and can no longer be discerned.”
ai-snp5.7:7.2_0: Or is it possible to gourd
ai-snp5.7:7.3_0: Please explain this to me, O sage,
ai-snp5.7:7.4_0: for this Teaching has been understood by you.”
ai-snp5.7:8.3_0: by which they might be described.
ai-snp5.7:8.4_0: when everything has been completely removed,
ai-snp5.7:8.5_0: and all the way of speaking the path.”
